snippet: Four of five Iranian border guards seized by Pakistani militants along the volatile Iran-Pakistan frontier two months ago have been released, Iran state media reported Friday.
abstract: Iran state media report that four of five Iranian border guards seized by Pakistani militants along the volatile Iran-Pakistan frontier have been released.
lead_paragraph: Four of five Iranian border guards seized by Pakistani militants along the volatile Iran-Pakistan frontier two months ago have been released, Iran state media reported Friday.

headline.main: Iran: Border Guards Released by Pakistani Militants
headline.print_headline: Iran: Border Guards Released by Pakistani Militants
